prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests0.subt: The Charger provides a way to charge supported tools through the ME Network or manually using a crank. It can also be used to create Charged Certus Quartz Crystal from Certus Quartz Crystal, and Meteorite Compass from Compass.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests1.subt: To craft a meteorite compass, charge a normal compass in a Charger. This can be done very early by using a Wooden Crank.The Meteorite Compass points in the direction of the nearest Meteorite within a range of 2,700 blocks. If the compass is spinning rapidly there is Sky Stone in your chunk! If the compass is spinning slowly, then you need to explore more because you're out of range of the nearest Meteorite.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests2.subt: Before you head out to find your first Meteorite make sure to have an Iron Pickaxe or better. Meteorites are made out of a very hard material called Sky Stone which requires it. Make sure you mine to the center of the meteorite to collect the Certus Quartz Crystals, Certus Quartz Blocks and your Inscriber Presses!
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests3.subt: Inscriber Presses are found in the Sky Chest at the center of a Meteorite. They can be used to create circuits in an Inscriber.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests4.subt: Now that you have some Certus Quartz Crystals it's time to charge them. Toss one into the Charger you made earlier and get to cranking!
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests5.subt: This crystal possesses the unique ability to absorb and convert energy from one form to another, and is the foundation of all ME technology. Fluix Crystal is crafted by placing Charged Certus Quartz Crystal , Nether Quartz and Redstone Dust in water. It will quickly start to react, and result in a Fluix Crystal.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests6.subt: To craft the processors required for more advanced machines, you'll need the Inscriber. Each type of processor has an associated press, which you will find in meteorites. Each operation requires 1k AE charged up.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests7.subt: A wrench made of Certus Quartz Crystal or Nether Quartz. Useful for rotating blocks, and removing individual parts from cables.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests8.subt: A modified furnace capable of generating AE Power instead of smelting ores. When placed on an ME Network it will charge Energy Cell or power other Network Devices.The Vibration Chamber will burn almost any solid burnable fuel for power. It will slow, or accelerate the burn depending on how much power it is able to store vs what is wasted. Generates between 1 and 10 AE/t depending on its burn speed.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests9.subt: Stores up to 200,000 AE. They do not accept power directly, but are used to add additional power storage to an already existing ME Network.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests10.sub: Stores AE energy up to 1.6 million units. They do not accept power directly but are used to add additional power storage to an already existing ME Network.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests11.sub: The Energy Acceptor converts energy from external systems into AE and stores it in the network.The following energy systems are supported: Forge Energy / Redstone Flux 2 FE = 1 AE.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests12.sub: A part designed to share energy between two ME Networks without sharing anything else, also used to craft Fluix ME Glass Cable.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests13.sub: Used in the creation of Calculation Processors in an Inscriber.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests14.sub: Used in the creation of Engineering Processors in an Inscriber.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests15.sub: Used in the creation of Logic Processors in an Inscriber.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests16.sub: Used in the creation of all Processors.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests17.sub: Silicon can be crafted by smelting Certus Quartz Dust. It's used alongside an Inscriber and Inscriber Silicon Press to create Printed Silicon.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests18.sub: Used to accelerate crystal growth, which allows you to create Certus Quartz Crystal andFluix Crystal from crystal dust. Must be powered by an ME Network via the top or bottom, and consumes a steady 8 ae/t while plugged in. Crystal Seeds must be in an adjacent water block to be effected, the seeds will shimmer more rapidly when in the presence of a powered Crystal Growth Accelerator. Can only connect to cables, or other networked machines on the top and bottom of the machine.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests19.sub: Used alongside an Inscriber and Inscriber Logic Plate to create a Printed Logic Circuit.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests20.sub: Used alongside an Inscriber and Inscriber Calculation Plate to create a Printed Calculation Circuit.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests21.sub: Used alongside an Inscriber and Inscriber Engineering Plate to create a Printed Engineering Circuit.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests33.sub: Redstone is a component when creating Processors.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests34.sub: A component required for making item storage cells. Storage Cells are one of the core mechanics of storage in Applied Energistics 2, there are three kinds: one for items, one for fluids, and one for regions of space. These ones store items only.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests35.sub: The ME Chest is the simplest way to use a Storage cell, it will give you direct access to the contents of the cell placed inside. It can be powered stand alone with external power, or as part of a ME Network. When on a network, the storage of the chest will be available to any other devices in the same network using an assigned Channel. When used without a network, the chest will not transfer full stacks at once, capping transfers at 38 items instead.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests36.sub: Used to display inventories of ME Chests and to hold Storage Drives.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests37.sub: A component used to create an ME Terminal.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests38.sub: Fluix ME Glass Cable is the simplest cable to make, transfers power and up to 8 Channels. It comes in 17 different colors, the default being Fluix, and can be dyed any color using any of the 16 dyes.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests39.sub: A component used to create an ME Terminal.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests40.sub: A component used in the creation of an ME Terminal.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests41.sub: A component used in the creation of an illuminated panel.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests42.sub: The ME Controller is the routing hub of a ME Network. Without it, only up to 8 devices can interact, any more and everything stops working.It is not possible to have 2 ME Controller in one ME Network.Unlike most ME Network devices, the ME Controller does not require channels, rather it emits them 8 or 32 per side, depending how many channels the device supports.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests43.sub: Sky Stone Blocks are crafted by melting Sky Stone in a furnace.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests44.sub: A block designed to do one thing, store Storage Cells. This block holds 10 storage cells so you can tightly pack your storage into a very small space.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests46.sub: Fluid Cells are the same as Item Cells, but instead of storing items they store fluids.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests47.sub: Storage components are the base of any cell you will make in AE2.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests79.sub: Portable cells are regular cells, but you can open them up like a backpack (minus the keybind). These still require energy, but can be great early game if your backpack isn't doing enough for you.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests81.des: Ever felt like drowning in a endless ocean? No? Just me? Well now you can anyways.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests82.des: This item is great for any automation, it saves you a ton of work and is easily crafted. A must have for every Tech enthusiast!
prom2.applied_energistics_2.quests83.des: The Crystal Resonance Chamber may not provide infinite amounts of Power, but for incredibly simple systems its more than enough. Anyone who just wants some storage or automate some certus loves this little funny heat sink looking Chamber.
prom2.applied_energistics_2.subtitle0: This Questline will get you familiarized with the basics of AE2. You should be able to get basic power generation as well as a storage system started here!
prom2.applied_energistics_2.title: &9 Applied Energistics 2
prom2.archon.quests0.subtitle: Welcome to the world of runes. This is where we make use of runes and mana to create magic spells, weaponry and even armor. Are you ready to learn the world of sorcery and runes?
prom2.archon.quests0.tasks0.title: Are you ready to become a Sorcerer?
prom2.archon.quests0.title: First Magic Steps
prom2.archon.quests1.subtitle: Beneath the depths of the world are Earth Essences, finding them will be no small task as the world underground is huge.
prom2.archon.quests2.subtitle: Beyond the void lie the End Essences found within End Islands, they will be very difficult to find unless you're determined enough.
prom2.archon.quests3.subtitle: You'll need this altar if you wanna trade with a Wizard Villager who will sell you magic runes to use.
prom2.archon.quests4.subtitle: This Rune is used around Arcane Magic.
prom2.archon.quests5.subtitle: This Rune is used around Fire Magic.
prom2.archon.quests6.subtitle: This Rune is used around Frost Magic.
prom2.archon.quests7.description0: You may also hold the channeler in your off hand and a block of your chosen metal to work.
prom2.archon.quests7.subtitle: The Channeler is a wand that can infuse mana into certain blocks that will create its crafted version or a new magic material. Test out some materials.
prom2.archon.quests7.title: Alchemy on a Stick
prom2.archon.quests8.subtitle: Spires are tall towers found in forest and mountain biomes that contain certain loot found there. Watch out for leeches!
prom2.archon.quests8.tasks0.title: Find a Spire
prom2.archon.quests8.title: Find a Spire
prom2.archon.quests9.subtitle: These Ancient Scrolls are used to help enhance a person's mana by either increasing one's capacity or mana regeneration capability.
prom2.archon.quests9.title: Are they made of Papyrus?
prom2.archon.quests10.subtitle: Looks like you figured out how to use the Channeler. Maybe you can do more with this material?
prom2.archon.quests10.title: Sorcerer's Metal
prom2.archon.quests11.subtitle: The Mask of Power boosts mana regeneration to 4 Mana per second while wearing it.
prom2.archon.quests11.title: Sorcerer's Helmet
prom2.archon.quests12.subtitle: A Mana Catalyst boosts the mana capacity of all player with an extra 50 Mana with the radius of 16 blocks.
prom2.archon.quests13.subtitle: An upgraded Mana Catalyst that boosts the mana capacity to 100 with a radius of 22 blocks.
prom2.archon.quests14.subtitle: A powerful Mana Catalyst that boosts the mana capacity to 200 within the range of 34 blocks.
prom2.archon.quests15.subtitle: The Sword allows the user to launch a small cloud of slowness to nearby targets.
prom2.archon.quests16.subtitle: The Charm allows the holder to walk on water when held in main hand and breathe underwater when inside the inventory.
prom2.archon.quests17.subtitle: The Bow launches a Ghast fireball and increases speed of the shot the longer the bow is pulled back.
prom2.archon.quests18.subtitle: Like The Wither, the Stave grants the user the ability to launch wither skulls against targets.
prom2.archon.quests19.subtitle: The Coat grants the wearer fire resistance and the implosion ability to cause explosion damage, the more mana the higher the damage.
prom2.archon.quests20.subtitle: The Blade grants the wielder the ability to teleport 8 blocks in the direction they're facing.
prom2.archon.quests21.subtitle: The Scepter grants the wielder the ability to teleport 10 blocks away in the direction they're facing, but will always cause implosion damage.
prom2.archon.quests22.subtitle: The Mace slams the ground, flinging around nearby targets around the user into the air and receive fall damage. Does not damage pets.
prom2.archon.quests23.subtitle: This ancient fist... perhaps S'kellak may help upgrade it.
prom2.archon.quests24.subtitle: The Axe grants the user a few seconds of resistance and ability to deflect projectiles away from the user.
prom2.archon.quests25.description0: The ingredients to summon the bosses are in your Grimoire.
prom2.archon.quests25.subtitle: The Pedestal is used to summon bosses using the right ingredients. You can shift click on it to remove all ingredients. Right click holding the ingredients onto the pedestal as there's no GUI.
prom2.archon.quests26.subtitle: The Crusher turns all target souls into mana. 20 mana per mob kill, 30 mana per player kill, and 50 mana per boss kill.
prom2.archon.quests27.subtitle: The Scythe grants the wielder a chance to reap out souls from their preferred target. The Staff of Undead is used to summon minions when given a core.
prom2.archon.quests27.title: Grim Reaper's Toys
prom2.archon.quests28.subtitle: The Scripture Table grants the player the ability to craft spell tomes using various ingredients. Similar to alchemy.
prom2.archon.quests28.title: Alchemy, but for Spellbooks
prom2.archon.quests32.subtitle: The Wand of Fire, can only use fire spells that are found in the Nether.
prom2.archon.quests33.subtitle: The Wand of Sky, can only use sky spells found in villages.
prom2.archon.quests34.subtitle: The Wand of Water, can only use water spells found in Ocean structures and fishing.
prom2.archon.quests35.subtitle: The Wand of End, can only use end spells found in End Cities or Strongholds.
prom2.archon.quests36.subtitle: The Wand of Earth, can only use earth spells found in temples and mineshafts.
prom2.archon.quests37.title: Fire Spells
prom2.archon.quests38.title: Water Spells
prom2.archon.quests39.title: Sky Spells
prom2.archon.quests40.title: Earth Spells
prom2.archon.quests41.title: End Spells
prom2.archon.quests42.subtitle: As the name implies, it contains lightning that can be released onto the ground when thrown. Can also be created when an empty bottle is struck by lightning.
prom2.archon.quests42.title: Thor's Breath
prom2.archon.quests43.subtitle: Magical Bookshelves are not only good for decoration, but used by Wizard Villagers to allow trade with magical trinkets.
prom2.archon.quests44.subtitle: Pixie Leaves are created with leaf blocks and channeler.
prom2.archon.quests45.subtitle: Spry Dust is created by infusing sand with mana using the Channeler.
prom2.archon.quests46.subtitle: Wearing these boots grants the wearer to fertilize plants and crops using mana and by crouching.
prom2.archon.quests46.title: Magical Farmer
prom2.archon.quests47.subtitle: Combustion Charges are used to dig out a 7x7 area on the ground or wall, good for mining.
prom2.archon.quests47.title: Ecofriendly TNT
prom2.archon.quests48.subtitle: The Fire Harvester increases mob loot chance related to fire.
prom2.archon.quests49.subtitle: The Breezy Harvester increases mob loot chance related to wind or air.
prom2.archon.quests50.subtitle: The Soaking Harvester increases mob loot chance related to water.
prom2.archon.quests51.subtitle: The Warping Harvester increases mob loot chance related to the End.
prom2.archon.quests52.subtitle: The Rocky Harvester increases mob loot chance related to the earth.
prom2.archon.quests53.subtitle: Small pouches used to store XP when needed. The pouch can store 550 XP.
prom2.archon.quests54.subtitle: An upgraded pouch that can store up to 2920 XP.
prom2.archon.quests55.subtitle: You must defeat this creature in order to harness the essence of the earth.
prom2.archon.quests55.title: Defeat the Earth Elemental
prom2.archon.quests56.subtitle: You must defeat this creature in order to harness the essence of the skies.
prom2.archon.quests56.title: Defeat the Sky Elemental
prom2.archon.quests57.subtitle: You must defeat this creature in order to harness the essence of flame.
prom2.archon.quests57.title: Defeat the Fire Elemental
prom2.archon.quests58.subtitle: You must defeat this creature in order to harness the essence of the seas.
prom2.archon.quests58.title: Defeat the Water Elemental
prom2.archon.quests59.description0: Please check your keybinds when you want to toggle which spells you want to use and press 1, 2, 3 to switch spells.
prom2.archon.quests59.subtitle: The Spell Binding Table requires bookshelves surrounding it, and it allows the user to bind spells into a Spell weapon using lapis and XP.
prom2.archon.quests59.title: Spellbinding!
prom2.archon.quests60.subtitle: The Wizard Set is a standard magic set to for novice magic users. Maybe there's a way to gain more power?
prom2.archon.quests60.title: Wizard's First Clothes
prom2.archon.quests61.subtitle: The Arcane Wizard Set grants the wearer increased arcane damage.
prom2.archon.quests61.title: Arcane Wizard Set
prom2.archon.quests62.subtitle: The Frost Wizard Set grants the wearer increased frost damage.
prom2.archon.quests62.title: Frost Wizard Set
prom2.archon.quests63.subtitle: The Fire Wizard Set grants the wearer increased fire damage.
prom2.archon.quests63.title: Fire Wizard Set
prom2.archon.quests68.subtitle: You hold the fire wizard's final weapon. You can summon fireballs, flame breaths and even meteors.
prom2.archon.quests68.title: Fire Wizard's Sorcery
prom2.archon.quests73.subtitle: You hold the arcane wizard's final weapon. You can now increase arcane damage over time and shoot out lasers.
prom2.archon.quests73.title: Arcane Wizard's Sorcery
prom2.archon.quests78.subtitle: You hold the frost wizard's final weapon. You can now slow and freeze enemies while shielding incoming damage with frost.
prom2.archon.quests78.title: Frost Wizard's Sorcery
prom2.archon.quests80.subtitle: You're not dealing with only Wizards, but Monks as well.
prom2.archon.quests81.subtitle: This is where your journey as a holy monk starts, are you ready to harness the power of light?
prom2.archon.quests81.title: Monk Trainee
prom2.archon.quests84.subtitle: You now hold the prior's strongest weapon. Decimate your enemies that blaspheme against your ideals.
prom2.archon.quests84.title: Prior's Miracle
prom2.archon.quests89.subtitle: You now hold the paladin's strongest weapon. Swing your claymore against enemies that blaspheme against your ideals.
prom2.archon.quests89.title: Paladin's Miracle
prom2.archon.quests95.subtitle: You now hold the crusader's strongest weapon. Smash your enemies that blaspheme against your ideals.
prom2.archon.quests95.title: Crusader's Miracle
prom2.archon.quests100.subtitle: You now hold the priest's strongest weapon. Send judgement towards your enemies that blaspheme against your ideals.
prom2.archon.quests100.title: Priest's Miracle
prom2.archon.quests101.subtitle: You have chosen the path of the Prior, a superior in a religious order. Are you ready to swing your mace to victory?
prom2.archon.quests101.title: The Prior Set
prom2.archon.quests102.subtitle: You have chosen the path of the Paladin, a holy knight of the sword. Are you ready to swing your claymore to victory?
prom2.archon.quests102.title: The Paladin Set
prom2.archon.quests103.subtitle: You have chosen the path of the Crusader, a travelling holy knight of the hammer. Are you ready to swing your great hammer to victory?
prom2.archon.quests103.title: The Crusader Set
prom2.archon.quests104.subtitle: You have chosen the path of the Priest, a leader of the church. Are you ready to wield your holy staff to victory?
prom2.archon.quests104.title: The Priest Set
prom2.archon.title: &bSpellcasting
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests0.descrip: &6Requires completion of &nChapter I&r&6 of Void's Invasion.
&7The Molten Core is a powerful artifact made from the depths of the Cinderstone's Volcano; &cVaaz&7.
&7With it, you can craft powerful and unique artifact weapons that have special abilities and bound to your soul, making it only usable by the one that forged it.
&bEncased Remnants&7 can be used to repair and reforge these weapons. You should also make a &6Hardening Catalyst&7 to make them unbreakable.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests0.title: &cS'kellak's Forge
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests1.descrip: &eCan be forged using an Essence of Wrath and an Awakened Lichblade, along with the Molten Core.
&8This item is a tribute to World of Warcraft's Frostmourne.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests1.subtitl: A cursed sword that holds the power of an eternal winter. The Frostmourne is a runic artifact infused with soulfrost magic. Legend says whoever wields it will become the ruler of the Death Knights, the Lich King.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests2.descrip: &eCan be forged using two Molten Edges along with the Molten Core.
&8This item is a tribute to World of Warcraft's Fyr'alath.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests2.subtitl: An agonizing soulfire weapon that gives great resistance to its wielder. Oriented for tanking, but has great fire damage.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests3.descrip: &eCan be forged using a Demonic Essence and a Soulrender, along with the Molten Core.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests3.subtitl: &7A'zhar was a demon that was trapped inside a scythe forged by S'kellak, making this soulfire weapon no ally, be careful when using it because it will try to betray you.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests4.descrip: &eCan be forged using the Essence of Glory and a Starforge, along with the Molten Core.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests4.subtitl: Forged from remnants of a dying star, the Supernova is an astral weapon that can deal damage using all magic elements, and obliterate any targets with astral bursts.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests5.descrip: &eCan be forged using an Essence of Wrath and a Fist of Fury, along with the Molten Core.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests5.subtitl: This soulfire fist can enrage anyone if also wielding its sister weapon; the Fist of Fury, making it a lethal choice for martial artists, using its powerful punches that burn the enemy's soul.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests6.descrip: &eCan be forged using a Demonic Essence and a Thunderbrand, along with the Molten Core.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests6.subtitl: A molten polearm, made out of Cinderstone and Noctisteel, infused with lightning, used by the long gone leader of the Serkonid race.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests7.descrip: &eCan be forged using an Essence of Glory and an Essence of Wrath. To unleash the twin swords, one must use the Essence of Ash'edar.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests7.subtitl: &7A pair of astral twin swords that harness the power of the Sun and Moon, using Arcane and Fire powers.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests8.descrip: &eCan be forged using the Essence of Glory and a Wizard Staff, along with the Molten Core.
&cEvolves to one of 5 stronger versions for Arcane, Fire, Frost, Holy or Astral mages within the Upgrade Tree.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests8.subtitl: &7An ancient Artifact forged using materials from far away stars. When infused with power, it can evolve to greater versions
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests9.subtitl: &7A cosmic bow infused by the power from the stars of the constellation of Orion.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests10.descri: &7All artifacts are upgradeable using their &6Upgrade Tree&7.
&7Once you forge your own Artifact, you will unlock its Upgrade Tree. You can access it by pressing &6N&7, and pressing the Molten Core icon at the top left.
&7All Upgrade Trees have up to &67 nodes&7 you can select, with different paths to take.
&7To unlock nodes, you will need to empower you artifact using &6Molten Remnants&7, which are rewarded in quests, or craftable using Mythical Essences.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests10.tasks1: &eObtain an Infused Molten Remnant from the Campaign.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests10.title: &cUpgrading your Artifact
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests11.descri: &8You've forged all Artifact Weapons and unlocked their Mastery. You've held all kinds of power. So let me ask you, what are you going to do with this knowledge?
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests11.title: &dEternal Knowledge: &eOf the Eternal Forge
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests12.subtit: &7A molten shield that display the symbol of the Living Statue, used by the highest rank protectors of the City of Vaaz
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests14.descri: &eYou proved your worth with Supernova by defeating 10 Mythical Challenges
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests14.title: &dMastery of Supernova
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests15.descri: &eYou proved your worth with Thunderwrath by defeating 10 Mythical Challenges
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests15.title: &dMastery of Thunderwrath
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests16.descri: &eYou proved your worth with Ekavar by defeating 10 Mythical Challenges
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests16.title: &dMastery of Ekavar
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests17.descri: &eYou proved your worth with Frostmourne by defeating 10 Mythical Challenges
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests17.title: &dMastery of Frostmourne
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests18.descri: &eYou proved your worth with Fury of a Thousand Fists by defeating 10 Mythical Challenges
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests18.tasks0: &dMythic Challenges Completed with Fury of a Thousand Fists
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests18.title: &dMastery of Fury of a Thousand Fists
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests19.descri: &eYou proved your worth with Vaazkar by defeating 10 Mythical Challenges
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests19.title: &dMastery of Vaazkar
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests20.descri: &eYou proved your worth with Orion by defeating 10 Mythical Challenges
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests20.title: &dMastery of Orion
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests21.descri: &eYou proved your worth with Ash'edar by defeating 10 Mythical Challenges
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests21.title: &dMastery of Ash'edar
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests22.descri: &eYou proved your worth with Fyr'alath by defeating 10 Mythical Challenges
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests22.title: &dMastery of Fyr'alath
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests23.descri: &eYou proved your worth with A'zhar by defeating 10 Mythical Challenges
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests23.title: &dMastery of A'zhar
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests24.subtit: A corrupted dagger infused with the eldritch being Gh'aj. It gives you high haste in exchange of your sanity.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests25.descri: &eYou proved your worth with Gh'aj by defeating 10 Mythical Challenges
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests25.title: &dMastery of Gh'aj
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests26.title: &dComing Soon
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests27.subtit: &7A great hammer born of glory and oath. Wielded by the most powerful Paladins, to protect their allies against any threat.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests28.descri: &eYou proved your worth with Apophis by defeating 10 Mythical Challenges
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests28.title: &dMastery of Apophis
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests29.descri: &7Did you update from a previous version and your &bFrostmourne's &7Artifact Skill Tree got a stat you didn't want?
&6No worries! You can reset your skill tree once, for free.
prom2.artifact_reforging.quests29.title: Mistake in Artifact Skill Tree?
prom2.artifact_reforging.title: &c&l S'kellak's Forge
prom2.botania.quests0.subtitle: It's time for you to play with nature. What we're going to be looking at is how to make use of the natural mana and soil to gain powerful artifacts and maybe farms. Are you ready?
prom2.botania.quests0.tasks0.title: Get Started
prom2.botania.quests0.title: Seedling's First Steps
prom2.botania.quests1.description0: Don't forget to check the Advancements for more hints too.
prom2.botania.quests1.subtitle: Getting a Lexica Botanica will help you understand the natural world around us. Getting one will be important to progress.
prom2.botania.quests1.title: Mother Nature's Encyclopedia
prom2.botania.quests2.subtitle: A Flower Pouch is important to have as you will be collecting different colored flowers and it will clog your inventory so a pouch for them is perfect.
prom2.botania.quests2.title: Seedling's Backpack
prom2.botania.quests19.subtitle: The Petal Apothecary is an important item used to creating certain items that will be beneficial to your progression.
prom2.botania.quests19.title: Natural Alchemy
prom2.botania.quests20.subtitle: The Pure Daisy is a plant that can 'purify' or tranform any log and stone into materials used to craft more sophisticated tools.
prom2.botania.quests20.title: Purification
prom2.botania.quests21.subtitle: Good start! Now you are ready to generate mana. Be sure to try out the different kinds of flowers as well for fun!
prom2.botania.quests22.subtitle: Now you created a flower with a unique function, good start! Now you can make interesting rituals and creations using these flowers as the base so try out the different kinds of flora with unique properties.
prom2.botania.quests22.title: &eAn Ecstatic Vivace
prom2.botania.quests63.subtitle: This plate is a very special item that is used to create a new ingot by infusing three mana dipped objects. One must use up half a mana pool's capacity in order for it to function properly. Be warned that the ritual will be wasted if the items aren't on the plate.
prom2.botania.quests63.title: Terra?
prom2.botania.quests64.subtitle: The Runic Altar is an important item that allows the creation of runes that are used in various tools. You must have it connected with a mana pool and materials to create a certain rune to function.
prom2.botania.quests64.title: Runestones?
prom2.botania.quests65.subtitle: The Wand of the Forest is an important item to carry around when commanding or redirecting magical items and mana pools to perform a certain function.
prom2.botania.quests65.title: You're a Druid, Harry!
prom2.botania.quests66.subtitle: A Mana Pool is an important item to have as they are used to store in generated or transferred mana in order to be used later.
prom2.botania.quests66.title: I thought we can swim in this?
prom2.botania.quests67.subtitle: A Mana Spreader is a block that can transfer mana to nearby blocks or structures that can hold mana. They can be rotated or facing a certain block by using the Wand of the Forest.
prom2.botania.quests67.title: Wireless Mana
prom2.botania.quests68.subtitle: A Mana Tablet is used to be able to carry mana around as a portable object and can be used to absorb or deposit mana. Each tablet can hold about half a mana pool's capacity.
prom2.botania.quests68.title: Mana Battery
prom2.botania.quests69.subtitle: A Terrasteel Ingot is a special ingot that can be used to create a stronger variant of tools made using manasteel ingots, but they're very expensive to create.
prom2.botania.quests69.title: Natural Steel
prom2.botania.quests90.subtitle: These Manasteel Tools are better than iron and can make use of mana to repair itself.
prom2.botania.quests90.title: Manasteel Tools
prom2.botania.quests91.subtitle: Just like the tools, the Manasteel Armor is better than iron and makes use of mana to repair itself.
prom2.botania.quests91.title: Manasteel Armor
prom2.botania.quests93.subtitle: This armor set is a specialized set of manasteel armor that makes the cost of mana lesser than the other mana set, only that this armor is weaker in defense.
prom2.botania.quests93.title: Manaweave Armor
prom2.botania.quests94.subtitle: There are only three weapons for the terrasteel, but they're stronger than their manasteel variant. Also, do your best to raise the rank of your Terra Shatterer.
prom2.botania.quests94.title: Terraforming
prom2.botania.quests95.subtitle: The highest rank attainable, such a powerful pickaxe that can drill through the heavens and the earth!
prom2.botania.quests95.title: Earthshaker
prom2.botania.quests96.subtitle: This Terrasteel Armor is a stronger version of the Manasteel Armor that can also passively charge your Mana Tablets in your inventory.
prom2.botania.quests96.title: Passive Mana Charger
prom2.botania.quests98.subtitle: Congratulations, you have defeated the boss and now have your rewards. Maybe there's a hard mode with more rewards?
prom2.botania.quests99.subtitle: If you use this, you will have to fight the boss again but harder, are you ready?
prom2.botania.quests99.title: Round Two!
prom2.botania.quests100.subtitle: Congratulations, now you earn a chance to gain an artifact, can you collect them all?
prom2.botania.quests100.title: Gacha Time
prom2.botania.quests108.subtitle: Doing this fight without armor is terrifying. I hope you fought it without creative mode.
prom2.botania.quests108.tasks0.title: I hope you didn't cheat.
prom2.botania.quests109.subtitle: This is the better version of the Mana Spreader that you'll craft. More mana payout. Oh, and do try out the different lens that you can attach to your Mana Spreaders.
prom2.botania.quests110.subtitle: This is the best mana spreader that Mother Earth can provide for your needs. This is much slower but its payout is much higher.
prom2.botania.title: &aBotania
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests0.description0: Make sure to read the Book of Shadows if you want to understand more in-depth of Bewitchment.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests0.subtitle: Hello there, I assume you're here because you want to become a witch, right? You've come to the right place.. this is where it begins, young witch.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests0.title: Witch's First Steps
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests1.subtitle: An interesting tree, it has unique properties that allow it to 'bleed out', perhaps you'll find it useful for your future endeavors. They're found in Nether Fortresses.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests1.title: The Tree of Blood
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests2.subtitle: This tree contains the essence of knowledge and intelligence, perhaps this will be useful in your future endeavors. They're found scattered around in forests.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests2.title: The Tree of Knowledge
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests3.subtitle: These trees have a smell of death around them, perhaps this will be useful with your endeavors later. They're found in taigas and swamps.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests3.title: The Tree of Death
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests4.subtitle: This tree has the properties of life itself, perhaps it'll be useful for your future endeavors. They're found in savannas.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests4.title: The Tree of Life?
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests5.subtitle: A special knife for us witches, it's going to be important for our rituals and scratching trees. Take good care of it.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests5.title: A Witch's Knife
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests6.subtitle: This will be very fun for our uses. Getting taglocks of other players will allow us to bind them to a ritual.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests6.title: Targeted Essence
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests7.subtitle: Ew, this is some weird goop that you got from a ghost.. well, it'll still be useful for what we need..
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests7.title: Ghost Essence
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests8.subtitle: This is a very nice coffin, comfortable and dark enough for a player to sleep during the day time until night.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests8.title: Vampire's Bed
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests9.subtitle: Having a poppet like this will make the target either cursed or protected, depending on how you use them, and there may be more than one type of poppet.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests10.subtitle: Ever felt that you have too many poppets in your inventory? These shelves will be perfect for your needs.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests10.title: Poppet Storage
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests11.subtitle: Demon Hearts are useful in creating special magical items that may be beneficial to the witch, although they may be difficult to obtain as you need to summon these demons.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests12.subtitle: The cauldron is perfect to brew potions using special ingredients that you can grow and scrape from.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests12.title: The Smelly Cauldron
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests13.title: Is this Wine?
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests20.subtitle: The Besmircher is able to disguise themselves in front of demons and are able to trade with them.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests20.title: Besmirchment Clothes
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests21.subtitle: The Alchemist is a master of witch brews and can double the duration effects of said brews when one wears it.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests21.title: Alchemist Clothing
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests22.subtitle: The Hedgewitcher is able to increase crop bounty when one wears such clothing.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests22.title: Hedgewitch Clothing
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests23.subtitle: An altar carries the magical energy that us witches use in doing rituals. In order to increase the capacity, one must decorate their altar with the appropriate materials and plant more trees around it.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests23.title: Witch's Energy Container
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests24.subtitle: A braizer is used for cursing, incense and rituals so having one will be vital if we want to be successful, young witch.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests24.title: Ritual Burner
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests25.subtitle: Chalk is important for a witch as they're the foundation of rituals as they need to draw a circle in order to activate. It's best to have one of each type of chalk ready.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests25.title: Chalk-Zone
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests26.subtitle: Salt is important in not just for food seasoning, but it is good for warding off evil spirits and demons that may go after you. Salt is good for barriers.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests26.title: Don't eat salt!
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests27.subtitle: At least you can enjoy a nice snack while you use garlic for magic purposes.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests27.title: Where's the Butter?
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests28.subtitle: Getting these two items are essential if you would like to make use of some items that are for curses or deooration. They're found by killing demons and demonhounds.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests28.title: Demon Parts
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests29.subtitle: A witch's item to be immune to fire at the cost of some magical energy. They're also fireproof.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests30.subtitle: This will prevent any mob from spawning within a 24 block radius.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests30.title: Natural Wall Lights
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests31.subtitle: Any mob who will come into contact with it will be teleported within a 64 block radius.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests31.title: Away With You!
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests32.subtitle: This bramble will grow a special fruit that can be used to create food items that will restore magical energy when consumed.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests32.title: Witch Bush
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests33.subtitle: Prevents from any entity from passing through, unless you sneak to get passed.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests33.title: You SHALL NOT PASS! easily.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests34.subtitle: Send any mob flying into the air when coming into contact.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests34.title: Springboard, but on a wall
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests35.subtitle: Burns any mob that comes into contact with the bramble.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests35.title: Firewall, but for entities, not viruses.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests36.subtitle: A witch's best friend. Used to create food items.
prom2.c_bewitchment.quests37.title: Witchberry Food
prom2.c_bewitchment.title: &c Witchcraft \& Rituals
prom2.collectibles.quests0.subtitle: Hello young explorer! Welcome to the Explorer's Journal where you will gather items that you wouldn't actively find. Are you up for the challenge?
prom2.collectibles.quests0.tasks0.title: Begin the Hunt
prom2.collectibles.quests0.title: Explorer's Journal
prom2.collectibles.quests1.subtitle: Poseidon has lost all of his fish for his personal aquarium! Help the God of the Sea by finding and fishing up some new specimen for the God and they'll reward you.
prom2.collectibles.quests1.tasks0.title: Time to go fishing!
prom2.collectibles.quests1.title: Poseidon's Aquarium
prom2.collectibles.quests2.title: Nether Depths' Fish
prom2.collectibles.quests3.subtitle: Ah yes, Captain Cornelia, a great captain who sailed until she fell into the depths of the freezing oceans, one must be daring enough to find her ship and take her treasures away, if they can find it.
prom2.collectibles.quests3.tasks0.title: Set sail!
prom2.collectibles.quests3.title: Captain Cornelia's Treasure Hunt
prom2.collectibles.quests4.subtitle: You have done the God of the Sea a huge favor! Now he will reward you for your efforts.
prom2.collectibles.quests4.title: Sea God's Fisher
prom2.collectibles.quests5.subtitle: Now that you found a special trinket, one must be curious on how it works. Beware the dead.
prom2.collectibles.quests5.tasks1.title: Send her to rest
prom2.collectibles.quests5.title: Call Captain back from the dead.
prom2.collectibles.quests6.subtitle: This armor was worn by the famous Captain Cornelia to survive the freezing depths of the ocean, will you do your best to collect the entire set and go down into the depths?
prom2.collectibles.quests6.title: Captain Cornelia's Armor
prom2.collectibles.quests7.subtitle: Nothing much can be found in such worn out pouches, but maybe you can get lucky?
prom2.collectibles.quests8.subtitle: An armor that makes one act similarly to a pufferfish, but it seems to be a very good set for those who love being reckless and fighting underwater.
prom2.collectibles.quests8.title: Armor of a Sea Terror
prom2.collectibles.quests9.subtitle: The Ice Maze is not only freezing and massive, but it also contains the scary depths of the ocean. Will you be able to take them down and return with the spoils?
prom2.collectibles.quests9.title: Terrors of the Ice Maze
prom2.collectibles.quests10.subtitle: You have finally found the captain's hideout, but now you must find her hidden treasure hidden away within.
prom2.collectibles.quests10.title: Captain Cornelia's Hideout
prom2.collectibles.quests12.subtitle: These weapons looked like they were used by Captain Cornelia's crew, but were eventually lost to the frozen depths, but are now in your hands to test their might.
prom2.collectibles.quests12.title: Sea Dog Weaponry
prom2.collectibles.quests13.subtitle: If you stare at the abyss, the abyss stares back at you. But if you have the courage to face any danger head on, then maybe they will reward you.
prom2.collectibles.quests13.title: Abyssal Sea Weaponry
prom2.collectibles.quests14.subtitle: Ah, a classic set of aquatic life, from Minecraft itself. Nothing is more memorable than the originals themselves.
prom2.collectibles.quests14.title: Minecraft's Aquatics
prom2.collectibles.quests15.subtitle: Demeter has left her plant life scattered across the world and is challenging anyone who is willing to gather them and satisfy the Goddess of Harvest and Agriculture and be rewarded.
prom2.collectibles.quests15.tasks0.title: Gardening
prom2.collectibles.quests15.title: Demeter's Garden
prom2.collectibles.quests16.subtitle: Man, Demeter is very excessive with the number variety of crops there are in the world. Well, it'd better be worth it in the end.
prom2.collectibles.quests16.title: Croptopia Seeds
prom2.collectibles.quests17.subtitle: Haven't you wondered if the number of tree varieties are just a combination of other fruit trees in order to produce more?
prom2.collectibles.quests17.title: Croptopia Trees
prom2.collectibles.quests18.subtitle: While not a very large variety of crops under Delight, but it is made up for it by being found fairly quickly.
prom2.collectibles.quests18.title: Delight Crops

prom2.collectibles_2.quests0.subtitle: Welcome, young collector, for here you see before you is a place where trinkets and accessories are gathered and admired by those around you. Are you up for the challenge?
prom2.collectibles_2.quests0.title: A Collector's Journey

And these records are almost lost to time, but we can still salvage them! You must find them and listen to what they have to offer.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests4.subtitle: While it's important to respect the graves of the dead, finding cool remains is worth showing for display to showcase the history. Once you find them and use the brush to dig them out, give your respect.

prom2.collectibles_2.quests66.subtitle: And I am Iron Man.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests67.subtitle: Stay away, creeps!

prom2.collectibles_2.quests71.subtitle: Got those hops?

prom2.collectibles_2.quests73.subtitle: When wearing running shoes, press B to run and you can zip away! Well, in Minecraft, this just makes our sprint faster.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests74.subtitle: Gonna need that snorkel and diving suit.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests75.subtitle: Hold your ground!
prom2.collectibles_2.quests76.subtitle: The most legendary artifact, the whoopee cushion. With its majestic appearance and functionality, it's a highly coveted item by jokesters.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests77.subtitle: A Recall Potion is something one should at least carry around as drinking it will teleport the player to their spawnpoint, a good way to escape or go home quickly. Eugh, it tastes awful though, considering that it uses a pearl. Shouldn't try it as a milk tea.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests77.title: Milk Tea?
prom2.collectibles_2.quests78.subtitle: Just your handy dandy guide to gathering Things. You can choose not to though, but you will feel smarter if you know where you're going.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests78.title: Know Your Thing
prom2.collectibles_2.quests79.subtitle: Using this key will allow one to protect their chests from being stolen and looted just by locking them. Use the key again to unlock your precious chests.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests79.title: Where are my Keys?
prom2.collectibles_2.quests80.subtitle: Now I know what you're thinking, why is it named this way? As you can see, the bucket and water content, have been flipped inside out! Now this thing's only purpose is infinite water supply, can't pick anything back up.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests80.title: Caution: Wet Thing
prom2.collectibles_2.quests81.subtitle: So this pouch is basically an ender chest that you can carry around. I wonder if you even need to put down an enderchest in your base anymore?
prom2.collectibles_2.quests81.title: Dimensional Bag
prom2.collectibles_2.quests82.subtitle: Okay, so while this looks like a regular monocle, but it enhances the wearer's vision to even work at night as if they're in the day! Now you can be a night owl!
prom2.collectibles_2.quests82.title: Owl's Glasses
prom2.collectibles_2.quests83.subtitle: So you know how plants get energy from being under the sun? Well, now with this thing, you can act similarly! But instead of the sun, it can be any nearby light source and now you can heal! Don't plant yourself into the soil though.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests83.title: Photosynthesis
prom2.collectibles_2.quests84.subtitle: So this item is not meant to be consumed at all, just keep it in your inventory and you may or may not end up receiving the effects of your drunken potions without drinking any.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests84.title: Take your Medicine!
prom2.collectibles_2.quests85.subtitle: So this tome in particular, is similar to the Recall Potion, but you need displacement pages that can be crafted and if one opens the tome, they can charge it with pearls and save a location that they can teleport to.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests85.title: A Book of Teleportation
prom2.collectibles_2.quests86.subtitle: Used for the Displacement Tome in order to teleport and write down locations that you are at and can teleport to anytime.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests87.subtitle: To improve one's mining efficiency, one must wear the proper protection as a miner! And wearing this glove will help you!
prom2.collectibles_2.quests88.subtitle: If you felt like you just want that extra power in your fist, then wear the riot gauntlet and make havoc! No punching cute things though.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests88.title: Start a Riot!
prom2.collectibles_2.quests89.subtitle: You know how Ghasts and Blazes are always shooting fireballs at you? Now you can do that with this handy scepter, but remember to carry ammunition.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests89.title: Portable Ghast
prom2.collectibles_2.quests90.subtitle: Hades has created a powerful crystal condensing his fire powers and whoever wears it will be immune to fire and even lava damage.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests90.title: Crystallized Hades Fire
prom2.collectibles_2.quests91.subtitle: Can't swim fast? Just swim harder!
prom2.collectibles_2.quests92.subtitle: These magnets are interesting, as they can pull in any item, even if they're not made of metal at all. Wonder if you can pull gravity?
prom2.collectibles_2.quests93.subtitle: Normally, one being light as a rabbit is an exaggeration, but this thing takes things literally by allowing the wearer to be so light that they can jump really high. Don't break any ankles.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests93.title: Light as a Rabbit
prom2.collectibles_2.quests94.subtitle: Be as lucky as a leprachaun and turn all your deadly spuds into golden apples.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests94.title: POTATO!!!
prom2.collectibles_2.quests95.subtitle: Are you annoyed with mending or having durability at all? Then craft yourself the most powerful material known to man, and make your item indestructible! Don't let it touch cacti though.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests95.title: Bedrock Tough
prom2.collectibles_2.quests96.subtitle: They're comfy socks, okay?
prom2.collectibles_2.quests97.subtitle: Always feeling short compared to others and can't reach? Then grab yourself the Arm Extender for only 10.99!!
prom2.collectibles_2.quests97.title: Extendo!
prom2.collectibles_2.quests98.subtitle: These boots will minimize the amount of fall damage the wearer experience by a huge margin, but just because the damage is less, doesn't mean you should be more reckless.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests98.title: Kinetic Energy? I hardly even know it.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests99.subtitle: A Gleaming Compound is a very precious material that is used to make more powerful Things, as they are very rare, they are definitely worth a lot just to get one.
prom2.collectibles_2.quests99.title: Shiny Red Stone

prom2.create.quests0.subtitle:
Welcome to Create, a steampunk mod that lets you build contraptions to do most things you can think of.

Create offers great guides for most of its items by hovering over them in REI or in your inventory and holding down 'W' to "ponder" the item. This brings up a menu explaining to use said item.

Because of this the chapter is mostly focused on letting you know what exists and giving you a rough outline of the progression of the mod.
prom2.create.quests0.tasks0.title: Welcome to Create!
prom2.create.quests0.title: &6Welcome to Create!
prom2.create.quests2.subtitle: The basis for more advanced blocks.
prom2.create.quests3.subtitle: The basis of most things fluid related in Create.\n\nCan also be used to encase fluid pipes.
prom2.create.quests4.subtitle:
In order to make a train you're going to need at least:
- 1 Train Casing
- 1 Train Station
- Enough train tracks to make your railroad.

In order to see how you assemble a train "ponder" the train station.
prom2.create.quests5.subtitle: Lets you transfer a redstone signal wirelessly within a range.
prom2.create.quests6.subtitle: A redstone component that outputs a signal when in contact with another redstone contact. Perticularly useful for building contraptions.
prom2.create.quests7.subtitle: A kinetic source that uses the flow of water as its source of energy. Will generate the same amount of SU at the same RPM as long as one block of flowing water is adjacent.\n\nYou can also swich the look of your water wheel by right-clicking it with pretty much any wood plank (including ones from other mods).
prom2.create.quests8.subtitle: Generates twice as much SU as the regular water wheel but at a slower RPM.
prom2.create.quests9.subtitle: Lets you see the current stress and stress capacity of a kinetic network.
prom2.create.quests10.subtitle: Lets you see the rotational speed of a kinetic network.
prom2.create.quests11.subtitle: The densest kinetic source. Although it also has the highest complexity, requiring a steady source of water and heat.
prom2.create.quests13.subtitle: Similar to a Hand Crank but only turns a certain amount of degrees with each interaction.
prom2.create.quests13.tasks0.title: Any Valve Handles
prom2.create.quests13.title: Valve Handles
prom2.create.quests14.subtitle: The simplest way to generate kinetic energy, by using yourself as the power source.
prom2.create.quests15.subtitle: In order to get brass you're going to need to heat a mechanical mixer that's mixing copper and zinc.\n\n the Empty Blaze burner can be filled by right-clicking it on either a blaze spawner or a blaze.
prom2.create.quests15.title: Blaze Burner
prom2.create.quests16.subtitle: A machine that can autocraft shapeless recepies aswell as mix things like potions.\n\nNeeds to rotate at at least 30 rpm to function
prom2.create.quests17.subtitle: Can be used to place or extract large bodies of liquid.
prom2.create.quests18.subtitle: Allows for the extraction of liquids from items.
prom2.create.quests19.subtitle: Used for filling items with fluids and crafting certain items using fluids.
prom2.create.quests20.subtitle: Allows contraptions to transfer fluids to blocks.
prom2.create.quests21.subtitle: Lets you use SU to break blocks, can also be attached to contraptions to make tunnel bores and the like.
prom2.create.quests22.subtitle: Blocks that can fell trees or allow contraptions to fell trees. As well as some crafting recipes like cutting blocks or stripping logs.
prom2.create.quests23.subtitle: Blocks that allow contraptions to harvest crops.
prom2.create.quests24.subtitle: Blocks that allow contraptions to create farmland or launch entities.
prom2.create.quests25.subtitle: Lets you clear and pave whilst riding a train.
prom2.create.quests26.subtitle: Essentially the an upgrade to the millstone, provides some different recipes so it might be worth keeping both around.
prom2.create.quests27.subtitle: Blocks that both allow for automatic crafting of normal recipes and the crafting of recipes that are bigger than a normal crafting table would allow for.
prom2.create.quests28.subtitle: An advanced item distribution machine.
prom2.create.quests29.subtitle: An item used to craft more advanced mechanical items.
prom2.create.quests30.subtitle: Allows for fine tuning of rpm.
prom2.create.quests31.subtitle: Allows you to control the train.
prom2.create.quests32.subtitle: Gives off a redstone signal when detecting a train.
prom2.create.quests33.subtitle: Used to controll the flow of trains across tracks and intersections of tracks.
prom2.create.quests34.subtitle: The block that deals with train assembly and dissasembly.
prom2.create.quests35.subtitle: Lets you schedule trains so that mobs or blaze burnders can drive them.
prom2.create.quests36.subtitle: The thing your train goes on.
prom2.create.quests36.tasks0.title: Any Train Track
prom2.create.quests36.title: Train Tracks
prom2.create.quests37.subtitle: Simply a Potato Cannon.
prom2.create.quests38.subtitle: Lets you place down a mirror that assists you in building symmetrical things.
prom2.create.quests39.subtitle: Grinding it all down to dust.
prom2.create.quests40.subtitle: A very versitile machine that can pull and push entities aswell as wash, haunt, blast and smoke items.
prom2.create.quests41.subtitle: When placed on the Encased Fan the Nozzle changes the area of effect of the pushing/pulling into a sphere instead of a line.

prom2.d_the_art_of_transmogrification.qu: &dTransmogrification&7 is a type of magic that allows you to &echange the shape of any object without altering its function&7, letting you to mask your items into another, including weapons and armors. It does not give any benefit aside from being purely cosmetic.
&7To start off, you must craft a &dTransmogrification Table&7. This magic is powered with &dAmethyst&7, so you'll have to get some each time you want to transform any item.
No items will be consumed, but to change the shape you'll need to own the desired item.
&7If you dont want to display an armor piece, or a weapon, you can hide the items!
&7By using a &dVoid Fragment&7 as the transmoggable material

prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests0.descrip: &7To get Oxygen into Oxygen Tanks, you will need to make an Oxygen Loader (or blow really hard into the Oxygen tank).
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests1.descrip: &7Space is a very Hostile place to be. To be safe and to be able to breathe, you will need a Space Suit. This space suit can later be upgraded to even have a Jet Propulsion system, handy!
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests1.title: Surviving Space
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests2.descrip: &7Congrats on making your first rocket! This thing will bring you into Orbit and to the moon if you want to. Any planet has an orbit so you can make a Space Station in any of them. To make a Space Station, simply bring enough steel, ostrum or desh with you. Different Space Stations above different planets need different amounts of Resources.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests2.title: &2Tier 1 Rockets
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests3.descrip: &7This neat and handy helper can load Rockets with fuel so you dont have to!
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests3.title: Fuel Loader
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests4.title: Launch Pad
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests5.descrip: &7The Nasa Workbench is used to craft Rockets. All Rockets use the same Recipe Layout, the only thing that changes is the level of material.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests5.subtitl: Still looking for a Nasa Collab
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests5.title: Nasa Workbench
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests6.descrip: &7You will need a ton of these things. They are used for nearly all Recipes.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests6.title: Craft Steel Plates
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests9.descrip: &7Ah Oil, this sticky liquid is used to make Fuels of many kinds, you will need a lot of this to reach all the Planets.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests11.descri: &7There is many ways of getting Iron and Steel Compressed. Best one is using the Tech Reborn Compressor, as you can overclock it to ludicrous speeds.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests11.title: The Art of Compressing
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests12.title: Obtain your first Steel!
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests13.descri: &7Similar to its thicker Counterpart, these are essential Components to your progression.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests13.subtit: Insert Steel pipe hitting the ground sound effect
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests13.title: Craft Steel Rods
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests14.descri: &7You can Obtain Steel by smelting Iron in a Blast Furnace. There is other ways but this is the best way by far as its cheap and easy.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests14.title: Obtaining Steel
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests15.descri: &7Getting Power can be a tricky endeavor. Start with a Coal Generator.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests15.title: Getting Power
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests16.descri: &7Ad Astra Machines work with any Power from any other Mod. You do not have to rely on Ad Astra's Power generation. Best Cables for you to use are Tech Reborn's, preferably their Glass Fiber Cables
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests16.title: Powering Ad Astra Machines
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests17.descri: &7To use all of that Oil you got, you will need to make a Fuel Refinery. Make sure to make quite a lot as you will need it later.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests17.title: Fuel Refinery
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests18.title: Your first Iron Plates
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests19.title: Craft your first Iron Rods
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests20.descri: &7These things hold gases, not so great for liquids though.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests20.title: Craft 2 Gas tanks
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests22.descri: &7The problem with other Planets is that they don't have Oxygen, i know, shocker - this is why you will need Oxygen Tanks, they supply you with the needed Oygen to be able to explore the planetss
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests22.title: Oxygen

prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests24.title: Oxygen needed!
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests25.descri: &7Fans will become more useful once you have visited your first Celestial Body. Two of them will do for now.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests25.title: Only - Fans
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests26.descri: &7The Engine Frame is the main component for the Steel Engine, make sure to make a couple engine frames.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests26.title: Engine Frame
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests27.title: Steel Engine
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests28.descri: &7Every Rocket requires 4 Fins - that makes 16 Fins for all 4 Rocket Tiers.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests28.title: Rocket Fins
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests29.descri: &7This is an integral part of all Rockets. You will need a total of 4 - one for each Tier of Rocket.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests29.title: Like Rudolph but a bit harder
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests30.descri: &7Storing large quantities of Gas can be annoying as it would take multiple buckets. This item solves that issue.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests31.descri: &7Whilst we live in a World full of Technology, there is also the power of magic. There is no need to fly every time when you can just bring a waystone.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests31.title: Going back and forth
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests32.descri: &7If you wanna be the first one to the moon, you also gotta be the one to bring a flag. Otherwise noone would believe you.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests32.title: The stars were made for us to conquer
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests33.title: &4To The Moon!
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests34.title: Killing stars
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests35.descri: &7Just like the Villagers in the Overworld, something like a plague must have corrupted these beings. This \"Infection\" seems a bit more Eldritch in nature, best to not get close and pick them off from a distance.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests35.title: Kill Corrupted Lunarians
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests36.descri: &7There is the proof that Cheese exists on the moon! And they called you a luna-tic...
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests36.title: Mhmmmm Cheese
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests37.descri: &7Desh can only be found on the Moon. It is a crucial Resource needed to get Tier 2 Rockets.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests37.title: Desh
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests38.title: Desh ingots
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests39.title: Desh Plates
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests41.descri: &7This is my wrench. There are many like it, but this one is mine.
&7My wrench is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life.
&7Without me, my wrench is useless. Without my wrench I am useless. I must use my wrench true. I must fix connections before they cause a backlog.
&7My wrench and I know that what counts in tech progression is not the machines we build, the noise of the machines, nor the smoke they make. We know that it is the efficiency that counts.

&7My wrench is flameborn even as I am flameborn, because it is my life. Thus, I will learn it as a brother. I will learn its weaknesses, its strength, its parts, its accessories, its metal and its size I will ever guard it against the ravages of weather and damage as I will ever guard my legs, my arms, my eyes and my heart against damage. I will keep my wrench clean and ready. We will become part of each other.
&7Before S'kellak I swear this creed. My wrench and I are the defenders of Vaaz. We are the masters of our machines. We are the saviors of my tech progression.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests42.descri: &7This Radio can actually play live music, great for ambience or a Party!

prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests70.descri: &7This is the last tier of Rocket. With this thing, you can visit other Solar Systems.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests70.title: &6Tier 4 Rockets
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests71.descri: &7This System features a quite unique Sun.

prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests84.descri: &7The Zip gun can be filled with Oxygen to propel you through places where gravity is a bit less than 1g, like orbit.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests84.title: Zip Gun
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests85.descri: &7You can Make a space Station in any Orbit around any Celestial body. Simply bring the proper ingredients with you on the flight. Once there, feel free to build whatever you want. Keep in mind that water freezes there.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests85.title: Your own Space Station
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests87.subtit: &6Fuel&r is hard to get; it &arequires venturing out&r to the ocean, looking for &boil spouts&r. The &3Cryo Freezer&r introduces a new way to obtain a better fuel &3Cryo Fuel&r. &3Cryo Fuel&r is much more efficient than &arefined fuel&r, allowing you to launch a rocket with just one &9bucket&r.
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests88.title: Rover
prom2.dplanets_and_space.quests89.subtit: The &bwater pump&r is essential for keeping the &boxygen distributor&r running infinitely. To use it, place an &binfinite water source&r below, then place the &bwater pump&r above one of the water blocks, and then place the &boxygen distributor&r adjacent to it. Make sure to supply both the &bwater pump&r and the &boxygen distributor&r with sufficient &cpower&r.&r

prom2.e_spell_books.quests0.description0: &eThe Spell Binding Table is the source of creation of Tier I spellbooks. It also allows you to attach spells to all spellbooks, regardless of their tier.
prom2.e_spell_books.quests0.description1: &7To maximize its performance and allow it to unlock all spells, you must surround it with &eBookshelves&7 similarly to an Enchanting Table.
prom2.e_spell_books.quests0.subtitle: &8[Click to read instructions]
prom2.e_spell_books.quests0.title: &eThe Spell Binding Table
prom2.e_spell_books.quests1.description0: &eBefore delving into creating your first spellbook, you might want to ask, what do tiers mean?
prom2.e_spell_books.quests1.description1: &8The difficulty next to them defines the complexity of each book, how hard it is to master them.
prom2.e_spell_books.quests1.description2: &eTier I: &7Base class books that can be obtained through the Spell Binding Table.
prom2.e_spell_books.quests1.description3: &6Tier II: &7Hybrid class books that require a crafting recipe using a Tier I book to be obtained.
prom2.e_spell_books.quests1.description4: &cTier III: &7Advanced class books that expand / evolve Tier II books, or have an advanced gameplay. They require a Cinderstone Trophy to be made.
prom2.e_spell_books.quests1.description5: &7A higher tier book &cdoes not mean it is stronger&7, rather that it is obtained in a different way.
prom2.e_spell_books.quests1.subtitle: &8[Click to read instructions]
prom2.e_spell_books.quests1.title: &eThe Power Within You
prom2.e_spell_books.quests2.description1: &7A basic book for bruisers or protectors. A great middle ground for slower Physical Damage builds.
prom2.e_spell_books.quests2.subtitle: &eTier I&7- &aEasy
prom2.e_spell_books.quests2.title: &eA Berskerking Path
prom2.e_spell_books.quests3.description1: &7A spellbook that focuses on providing utilities for rogue builds, from stacking damage increases to teleports, stuns and quick stealth.
prom2.e_spell_books.quests3.subtitle: &eTier I &7- &aEasy
prom2.e_spell_books.quests3.title: &eLethal Shadows
prom2.e_spell_books.quests4.description1: &7The basic spell book for Archers. Focuses on improving the archery gameplay with extra abilities. From a passive improvement of your shots, to crowd control and a rapidfire of arrows.
prom2.e_spell_books.quests4.subtitle: &eTier I &7- &aEasy
prom2.e_spell_books.quests4.title: &eThe Bullseye
prom2.e_spell_books.quests5.description1: &7Channel the primordial Holy powers to heal your allies.
prom2.e_spell_books.quests5.subtitle: &eTier I &7- &aEasy
prom2.e_spell_books.quests5.title: &eA Holy Healer
prom2.e_spell_books.quests6.description1: &7A ranged casting spell book that uses Arcane magic to deal very powerful attacks with high critical damage.

prom2.eenchanting.quests0.description0: &7 To start your Enchanting journey, you know the basics, get an Enchanting Table.
prom2.eenchanting.quests0.description1: &7 Once using a an enchanting table, will see 3 bars at the bottom of it; Eterna, Quanta and Arcana
prom2.eenchanting.quests0.description2: &7 &aEterna&7 - Controls what level your Enchanting Table is at, this changes the cost but also what enchants you can get, EXP level is 2x the Eterna, so 50 Eterna is 100 Lvls needed to enchant.
prom2.eenchanting.quests0.description3: &7 &4Quanta&7 - Pure chaos, the more you have, the more random everything gets, not recommended to max out.
prom2.eenchanting.quests0.description4: &7 &5Arcana&7 - This stat changes the rarity, amount of enchants. You dont want max of it to get things like Protection or Sunfire.
prom2.eenchanting.quests0.subtitle: Further improving your gear
prom2.eenchanting.quests0.title: The Enchanting Table
prom2.eenchanting.quests1.description0: &7To keep going in your journey, your next step is either Seashelves or Hellshelves, This will get you some of your first stats for your Enchanting. You will need 15 in total or a mix of both to get fully started.
prom2.eenchanting.quests1.description1: &7Craft a few more of either to infuse them!
prom2.eenchanting.quests1.subtitle: Lets get this started!
prom2.eenchanting.quests1.title: Getting Started, Seashelves
